cards.title: Alien Escape Pod
body: Targets in this play area are immune to melee damage. At the start of this play area’s turn, destroy this card.

When this card is destroyed, it deals each other target in this play area 2 irreducible fire damage. Then, discard cards from the top of the environment deck until a Storage card is discarded. Put it into play.
cards.flavorText: Tempest inspected the controls.{BR}“Unfortunately, there are no saved{BR}destinations in range. Fortunately,{BR}the TCF Stalwart is not in range.”

cards.title: Cryo-Regulator
body: At the end of this play area's turn, choose fire damage or cold damage.
This card is immune to damage of the most recently chosen type.
Whenever another target in this play area would be dealt damage of the most recently chosen type, reduce that damage by 1 and change its damage type to the type that wasn't chosen.
cards.flavorText: “Hey, Ryan! Remember this?” Citizen{BR}Hammer lashed out at Tachyon, and{BR}the flames broke against the blue{BR}plating. “Look, it still works!”

cards.title: Custody Officer
body: When this card is discarded from the environment deck, put it into play.
Whenever an environment card enters a villain play area, this card deals the character or Device with the highest HP in that play area 2 projectile damage.
At the end of the environment turn, if there are no Storage cards in play, put a Storage card from the environment trash into play.
cards.flavorText: Officer Davis pulled his sidearm and{BR}fired a warning shot at the{BR}Dreamer’s projection. “Get your{BR}paws off that, you damn dirty ape!”

cards.title: Ebony Needle
body: At the end of this play area's turn, this card may deal a character card in this play area {H - 1} psychic damage. If it deals no damage this way, destroy a non-character card from this play area's deck, then destroy this card.
When this card is destroyed, if the environment trash has fewer than {H} cards, discard cards from the top of the environment deck until a Storage card is discarded. Put it into play.
cards.flavorText: [b]“Pin!”[/b] Lillian immediately dropped{BR}everything to search up and down{BR}her body for the arcane implement.{BR}Removal was quick, but not painless.

cards.title: Evacuation Procedure
body: At the end of the villain turn, the villain target with the highest HP deals each Officer 3 sonic damage. Then, that target deals the {H - 1} Storage cards with the highest HP 1 sonic damage each. Then, destroy this card.
When this card is destroyed, shuffle all Storage cards from the environment trash into the environment deck.
cards.flavorText: “Attention all wimps!” Citizen Hammer{BR}pounded the fire alarm with his fist{BR}and grinned. “This is not a drill. It’s{BR}going to get very hot in here.”

cards.title: Evidence Crate
body: Reduce damage dealt to this card to 1.

Whenever a non-environment target deals damage to this card, discard the top card of the environment deck. Then, select a Device card at random from the environment trash and put it into play in the play area of the target that dealt damage.
cards.flavorText: Shelves stretched into the distance.{BR}The Organization’s men would arrive{BR}soon to recover the ledger...{BR}“Spread out. Let’s find that book.”

cards.title: Faceless Duplicate
body: When this card enters a play area with an active character card, move it next to that character. The first time that character would be dealt damage each turn, redirect that damage to this card.
When this card is dealt lightning damage, move it to the play area of the source of that damage.
cards.flavorText: “Awww, look, he’s lost!” The damaged{BR}android’s stumbling movements{BR}struck Unity as oddly charming.{BR}“Here, bot! I’ve got a recharge!”

cards.title: Razor Dart
body: As long as this card is in a hero play area, it has the keyword Equipment.

When a non-Device target in this play area deals damage to a target from another deck, increase that damage by 1 and change its type to projectile. Then, if the damaged target is still in play, move this card to the damaged target’s play area.
cards.flavorText: “Wow, I haven’t used those since{BR}college.” Maia watched a thug yank{BR}the dart out of the wall and fling{BR}it back at Legacy. “And that’s why.”

cards.title: Sample 01-DON
body: When this card enters play, it deals the character with the highest HP in this play area 2 irreducible toxic damage. If no damage was dealt this way, play the top card of the environment deck.
The first time another target in this play area deals damage each turn, this card deals 1 infernal damage to each non-environment target in the damaged target's play area.
cards.flavorText: The vial crunched under Pete’s foot,{BR}but he felt fine. He socked one{BR}Proletariat in the jaw- and six{BR}separate bodies convulsed in pain.

cards.title: Sample 4B-PIKE
body: At the end of this play area's turn, one non-environment target in this play area regains 2 HP and this card deals itself 1 toxic damage. If no targets regained HP this way, play the top card of the environment deck.
When this card is reduced to 0 or fewer HP, it deals the non-environment target in this play area with the highest HP 3 toxic damage.
cards.flavorText: “Did you just [b]drink[/b] that!?” Setback{BR}shuddered. The Operative smashed{BR}the empty vial against a shelf and{BR}rushed him with the jagged edge.

cards.title: Security Officer
body: When this card is discarded from the environment deck, put it into play.
The first time a Storage card would be dealt damage each turn, prevent that damage.
The first time a Device card would be dealt damage each turn, prevent that damage.
cards.flavorText: “The Wraith? Listen, lady, I don’t{BR}care if you’re Charles Manson or{BR}the Dalai Lama- nobody touches this{BR}stuff without proper authorization.”

cards.title: Unlikely Explosive
body: When this card enters play, move it next to the target other than itself in this play area with the highest HP. This card deals that target 2 energy damage.
Whenever a card from that target's deck is played, this card deals the non-environment target with the highest HP in each other play area 1 energy damage, then deals itself 1 energy damage.
cards.flavorText: “What are these doing-?” An attack{BR}surprised Amanda in mid-sentence.{BR}She instinctively flung the box at{BR}Cueball, where it exploded. “OHhh.”
